statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT age, COUNT(*) as TotalPatients FROM patients GROUP BY age HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 40
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC, patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' OR address LIKE '%Street'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, address FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment, prescribing_doctor FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, address, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE address ILIKE '%avenue%';
SELECT provider_id, name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT Patients.first_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, HealthcareProviders.name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN HealthcareProviders ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = HealthcareProviders.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY visit_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, MedicalRecords.visit_date, HealthcareProviders.name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN HealthcareProviders ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = HealthcareProviders.provider_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE record_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.doctor_name FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT d.doctor_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM appointments a JOIN doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name ORDER BY num_appointments DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.*, m.diagnosis, a.appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id ORDER BY a.appointment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'C%' AND prescription IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='M' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT p.full_name, m.record_date, m.diagnosis, m.prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id ORDER BY m.record_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT d.full_name AS doctor_name, a.appointment_date, p.full_name AS patient_name, a.status FROM doctors d JOIN appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id JOIN patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE a.status='scheduled' ORDER BY a.appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.full_name, SUM(py.amount) AS total_payments FROM patients p JOIN payments py ON p.patient_id = py.patient_id GROUP BY p.full_name ORDER BY total_payments DESC LIMIT 5;
